name: DAWN OF ARBA
description:
DAWN OF ARBA is an online multiplayer game where players will need to adapt to living in a new unfamiliar world in order to survive. Adventurers will need to gather resources and supplies and level up their characters to survive the dark secrets that lie within the world of ARBA.

Gameplay mechanics include:
  • Alchemy
  • Base Building
  • Crafting
  • Character Building
  • Farming & Herbalism
  • PvP & PvE
  • Melee and Ranged Combat
  • and much more.. (secrets that should not be revealed)

In order for players to survive, they'll need to strengthen their character as they perform various tasks to survive. From Warriors and Archers to Blacksmiths and Farmers, level up your skills, unlock talents and shape the destiny of your character down any path you desire. Build up your defenses and protect your loot from hostile enemies at all costs. Be warned however, as other players may not be the only cause for concern.

Venture beyond the safer biomes into treacherous poisonous swamps, unforgiving dunes or experience the freezing bite of the arctic and discover that although the world of ARBA is beautiful at first sight, it's history harbors a hidden secret and a much deeper and dangerous truth.
